author: Tim Daniels
title: Browns Owners Dee, Jimmy Haslam Pledge $1.5M to Coronavirus Relief in Ohio
description: The  Cleveland Browns   announced  Monday team owners Dee and Jimmy Haslam have pledged $1.5 million to help coronavirus relief efforts in Ohio...
content:
David Richard/Associated Press
The Cleveland Brownsannounced Monday team owners Dee and Jimmy Haslam have pledged $1.5 million to help coronavirus relief efforts in Ohio. 
"We are humbled by the tremendous work of people around the world in their efforts to… [+989 chars]
